#summary Open source eXtensions for SDL Tridion.

= Introduction =

Here you will find eXtensions for SDL Tridion (versions 2011 and up mostly). These extension are released to the public domain under the Reciprocal Public License (RPL) so that everybody can use them and help to further develop it.

= Contents =

  * *Item Selector* - Custom URL for selecting an item URI from a SDL Tridion tree view
  * *XHTML to BBCode convertor* - DWT Template function source for converting RTF XHTML into BBCode
